void usb_can_scene_error_dialog_on_enter (void *context)
 This function is called when SCENE-ERROR-DIALOG is entered. It will display 2 popup messages and an icon.
 
bool usb_can_scene_error_dialog_on_event (void *context, SceneManagerEvent event)
 This function is called when a key is pressed by the user. If it is back key SCENE-START is re-entered.
 
void usb_can_scene_error_dialog_on_exit (void *context)
 This function is called by usb_can_scene_error_dialog_on_event() via scene_manager before leaving SCENE-ERROR-DIALOG. It call widget_reset.
